data.title: MediaCoder Handsets Edition
data.meta_description: MediaCoder Handsets Edition, free download. MediaCoder Handsets Edition: MediaCoder Handsets Edition by Broad Intelligence is a stand-alone media â€¦
data.text:
MediaCoder Handsets Edition by Broad Intelligence is a stand-alone media converter specifically designed for mobile devices. It supports a wide range of audio and video formats, allowing users to easily convert their files to a format that is compatible with their mobile phone or tablet. With its intuitive interface and comprehensive features, MediaCoder Handsets Edition can convert even the most complex media files in just a few clicks.

The program comes with a built-in template library that includes profiles for popular mobile devices such as Apple iPhone, iPad, Samsung Galaxy, HTC One, and many more. Users can also customize their own conversion settings based on their specific needs. In addition to its conversion capabilities, MediaCoder Handsets Edition also comes with basic editing tools such as trimming and cropping, enabling users to make minor adjustments to their media files before converting them.

MediaCoder Handsets Edition is an excellent choice for anyone who needs a reliable media converter for their mobile device. Its user-friendly interface and extensive feature set make it perfect for both novices and advanced users alike.

Overview

MediaCoder Handsets Edition is a Shareware software in the category Miscellaneous developed by Broad Intelligence.

The latest version of MediaCoder Handsets Edition is currently unknown. It was initially added to our database on 11/12/2012.

MediaCoder Handsets Edition runs on the following operating systems: Windows.

MediaCoder Handsets Edition has not been rated by our users yet.
